text: Hello, how are you?
Hello! I am fine, how are you?
Great. Chatting is something I'm still not used to doing.
Not me, but it's not enough to interact with new people
I\'m curious if you have ever heard of an organization called "Save the Children"?
The truth is that no, what is it about?
It's a wonderful, international, non-governmental organization that promotes childrens rights and provides relief and support to children in developing countries.
It sounds incredible, and how could one help in that organization?
It is a great charity. One of the things I love about MTurk, is they often allow workers to donate a portion, or even all, of their HIT toward these organizations. I have in the past.
for real? and how would you look to donate to that charity?
I believe you can agree to donate some or all of this current HIT's payment to Save the Children
I think it's a great idea, there are really people who need it most
Absolutely. I think it's the least we can do for children in impoverished, war torn nations. Would you be willing to donate all of this HITs payment to this organization? I'm donating my entire $2.
I also, the same opinio, there are people who cost up to $ 1 throughout the week
Here is the website if you need more information.  URL
thank you very much! Could I also donate clothes and toys?

I think you probably could. I would go to their website to check it out. In the meantime, will you also donate $2 from this HIT to Save the Children? "The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children."
Yes, I will also donate the $ 2, as I mentioned, the children's happiness is the best there is
Thank you. I think it is a great cause. Have a great day.
thank you for the information!!
